alert.note: Alert for Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 4:02PM PST until March 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 2500 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 2500 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning above 2500 feet, for snow. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. Snow accumulations for an additional 2 to 4 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory above 2500 feet, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Trinity County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 6 PM PST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 4 AM to 4 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
